_sText:
THIS MAP IS AN OLD VERSION! PLEASE GO HERE FOR "REDUX"!

BUSES FROM HELL!!! Ever wonder what it would be like if you were thrown into a gladiatorial arena and forced to battle two buses from HELL?! Well, now you can experience it for yourself in the safety of your own home! This is... BUSES_FROM_HELLv2! Objectives: T's - Control the buses with your MIND and try to run over the CT's! Kill them all! CT's - Survive the onslaught of buses by ducking, diving, and dodging! Stay alive for two minutes to win! Notes: My friends and I had a blast testing this map, get about 5+ people and I guarantee you will have a good time. Start the mayhem! UPDATE 4/16/09 -Fixed the spawns -Added more CT spawns (now supports 64 player games) -Added/edited some minor geometry -Made it easier to see the CT's under the T platform -Minor graphical upgrades -Added some more props/cars. !!!!MAKE SURE YOU TURN TEAM BALANCING OFF!!!! Thanks to JasenM for the buses!
